extracted_playbook.title: Enable IGMP Snooping
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that IGMP Snooping is enabled on the switch to intelligently forward multicast traffic only to necessary ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure VLAN Interface Settings
extracted_playbook.description: Set up VLAN interface settings on the switch to ensure proper IGMP operation.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multicast Filtering
extracted_playbook.description: Use IGMP filtering to control the propagation of IGMP traffic through the network, configuring filters on a switch virtual interface (SVI), per-port, or per-port per-VLAN basis.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control and safety system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from the business network.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Physical Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Install physical controls to prevent unauthorized access to industrial control and safety systems, components, peripheral equipment, and networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Controllers
extracted_playbook.description: Place all controllers in locked cabinets and never leave them in the 'Program' mode.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Never connect programming software to any network other than the network intended for that device.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Mobile Data Exchange Methods
extracted_playbook.description: Scan all methods of mobile data exchange with the isolated network such as CDs, USB drives, etc. before use in the terminals or any node connected to these networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Sanitize Mobile Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Never allow mobile devices that have connected to any other network besides the intended network to connect to the safety or control networks without proper sanitation.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and systems and ensure that they are not accessible from the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods, such as virtual private networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available.
